title: FSX - Courchevel Airport Scenary REPACKED
description:
Courchevel X Scenary package for FSX which was previously uploaded for fsx but has mysteriously dissappeared. So I have repacked it and uploading It here (I did not originally upload this file therefore it is not me you need to thank.

Info

This package includes moving chairlift up and down the mountain, all the rightfull apartments and roads together with the breathtaking sloping runway with superb texture.

Installation

Simply add the contents of the folders in your Microsoft Flight Simulator X Directory and then enter Flight Simulator and go Into your scenary library (in settings as you go into fsx) and add the files "LLH5" and the "LLH5_lc" folders (in turn (located in your addon Scenary folder withing your Microsoft Flight Simulator directory. 
Thats It!!

Resolving Known Problems

Many People have experienced problems with seeing trees appear on the runway etc. If this happens then simply delete the "LLH5_lc" folder from your scenary library folder located in the settings in FSX.
